name: Ghostery Store
description:
You work in a grocery store and your job is to fill out online orders within the timeframe. Be careful though, customers will try to stop you and talk to you and that might make you late for getting an order ready!

To start the game interact with the computer at the top of the screen.

I am not a game dev or an artist and this is the first game I've ever made so please don't be too harsh but I would love some feedback on what I could have done differently and whatnot! Also, I tried making this easy enough to win within a try or two but please let me know if that wasn't the case.

Controls:

Movement is controlled with the arrow keys.

Enter works for the dialog interactions.

Shift is sprint, though you have to hold it down!
